name: indestructibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to destroy: His colleagues suffered various failures, but he appeared to carry on indestructibly. She looked young, happy, and indestructibly beautiful. Vegetables are now bred to be indestructibly shippable, but they taste like the cartons they arrive in.
More examplesFewer examplesThe play contains some indestructibly funny jokes.Throughout his long career, he always remained indisputably and indestructibly himself.She has always been indestructibly loyal to her close friends.Madeira is one of the world's most distinctive and indestructibly popular wines.The guests are served by immaculately dressed and indestructibly polite waiters.
